mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.unified_id , t1.asset_id , t1.furniture_name , t1.furniture_category , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.user_id , t1.user_dept , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.furniture_spec , t1.created_date , t1.position_id , t1.guarantee_date , t1.contract_num , t1.apply_num , t1.check_num , t1.is_fixed_assets , t1.assets_finance_type , t1.assets_source , t1.assets_finance_state , t1.finance_entry_date , t1.original_value , t1.total_depreciation , t1.depreciation_method , t1.depreciation_year , t1.net_salvage_rate , t1.net_salvage , t1.month_depreciation_rate , t1.month_depreciation , t1.year_depreciation_rate , t1.year_depreciation , t1.net_value , t1.month_count , t1.month_remain , t1.institute_or_company , t1.index_info , t1.is_trans_fixed , t1.proof_num , t1.is_in_workflow , t1.furniture_photo , t1.furniture_state , t1.parent_id , t1.parent_name , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.guarantee_period , t1.unit_price from assets_furniture_account t1
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.UNIFIED_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedId}),'%')
and t1.ASSET_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetId}),'%')
and t1.FURNITURE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furnitureName}),'%')
and t1.FURNITURE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furnitureCategory}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerId}),'%')
and t1.OWNER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerDept}),'%')
and t1.USER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.userId}),'%')
and t1.USER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.userDept}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerId}),'%')
and t1.FURNITURE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furnitureSpec}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_DATE >= #{bean.createdDateBegin}
and t1.CREATED_DATE <= #{bean.createdDateEnd}
and t1.POSITION_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.positionId}),'%')
and t1.GUARANTEE_DATE >= #{bean.guaranteeDateBegin}
and t1.GUARANTEE_DATE <= #{bean.guaranteeDateEnd}
and t1.CONTRACT_NUM like concat(concat('%',#{bean.contractNum}),'%')
and t1.APPLY_NUM like concat(concat('%',#{bean.applyNum}),'%')
and t1.CHECK_NUM like concat(concat('%',#{bean.checkNum}),'%')
and t1.IS_FIXED_ASSETS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isFixedAssets}),'%')
and t1.ASSETS_FINANCE_TYPE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetsFinanceType}),'%')
and t1.ASSETS_SOURCE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetsSource}),'%')
and t1.ASSETS_FINANCE_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.assetsFinanceState}),'%')
and t1.FINANCE_ENTRY_DATE >= #{bean.financeEntryDateBegin}
and t1.FINANCE_ENTRY_DATE <= #{bean.financeEntryDateEnd}

and t1.MONTH_DEPRECIATION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.monthDepreciation}),'%')
and t1.YEAR_DEPRECIATION_RATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.yearDepreciationRate}),'%')
and t1.YEAR_DEPRECIATION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.yearDepreciation}),'%')
and t1.NET_VALUE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.netValue}),'%')
and t1.MONTH_COUNT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.monthCount}),'%')
and t1.MONTH_REMAIN like concat(concat('%',#{bean.monthRemain}),'%')
and t1.INSTITUTE_OR_COMPANY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.instituteOrCompany}),'%')
and t1.INDEX_INFO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.indexInfo}),'%')
and t1.IS_TRANS_FIXED like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isTransFixed}),'%')
and t1.PROOF_NUM like concat(concat('%',#{bean.proofNum}),'%')
and t1.IS_IN_WORKFLOW like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isInWorkflow}),'%')
and t1.FURNITURE_PHOTO like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furniturePhoto}),'%')
and t1.FURNITURE_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.furnitureState}),'%')
and t1.PARENT_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.parentId}),'%')
and t1.PARENT_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.parentName}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')

and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_21 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute21}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_22 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute22}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_23 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute23}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_24 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute24}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_25 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute25}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_26 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute26}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_27 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute27}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_28 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute28}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_29 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute29}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_30 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute30}),'%')
and t1.GUARANTEE_PERIOD like concat(concat('%',#{bean.guaranteePeriod}),'%')
and t1.UNIT_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unitPrice}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.unified_id , t1.asset_id , t1.furniture_name , t1.furniture_category , t1.owner_id , t1.owner_dept , t1.user_id , t1.user_dept , t1.manufacturer_id , t1.furniture_spec , t1.created_date , t1.position_id , t1.guarantee_date , t1.contract_num , t1.apply_num , t1.check_num , t1.is_fixed_assets , t1.assets_finance_type , t1.assets_source , t1.assets_finance_state , t1.finance_entry_date , t1.original_value , t1.total_depreciation , t1.depreciation_method , t1.depreciation_year , t1.net_salvage_rate , t1.net_salvage , t1.month_depreciation_rate , t1.month_depreciation , t1.year_depreciation_rate , t1.year_depreciation , t1.net_value , t1.month_count , t1.month_remain , t1.institute_or_company , t1.index_info , t1.is_trans_fixed , t1.proof_num , t1.is_in_workflow , t1.furniture_photo , t1.furniture_state , t1.parent_id , t1.parent_name , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.attribute_21 , t1.attribute_22 , t1.attribute_23 , t1.attribute_24 , t1.attribute_25 , t1.attribute_26 , t1.attribute_27 , t1.attribute_28 , t1.attribute_29 , t1.attribute_30 , t1.guarantee_period , t1.unit_price from assets_furniture_account t1
